head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths FREEMAN, MILTON V.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths FREEMAN, MILTON V.

block.p: FREEMAN-Milton V., on Saturday, June 3rd, 2000, of Chevy Chase, MD. Husband of Phyllis Freeman; father of Nancy Freeman Gans (Jerome), Daniel Freeman (Mimi Legat), Andrew Freeman and Amy Malone (John); grandfather of Lisa, Rachel and Shira Gans. Funeral services will be held on Tuesday, June 6th, at 11AM, at Temple Sinai, 3100 Military Rd, NW, Washington, DC. Interment Judean Memorial Gardens, Olney, MD. Shiva will be observed at the family residence, Tuesday through Thursday. Memorial contributions may be made to The Columbia University Law School Freeman Scholorship Fund or the American University Law School Freeman Scholorship Fund or to the charity of your choice. For information Takoma Funeral Home, NW, Washington, DC.
